amendment.description: Amendment to the DeFazio amendment (A012) clarifies that the prohibitions contained in the amendment do not apply to continued research and development of space-based interceptors and lasers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to clarify that the prohibitions contained in the amendment do not apply to continued research and development of space-based interceptors and lasers.

action.text: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Dicks to the DeFazio amendment (A012).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dicks amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
